mapper.insert: insert into entity(name, parent_id, description, image_url, user_id, overview, feature, status) values(#{name}, #{parentId}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{userId}, #{overview}, #{feature}, #{status})
mapper.update: update entity set name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parentId}, description = #{description}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, user_id = #{userId}, overview = #{overview}, feature = #{feature}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
update entity set status = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from entity where parent_id is null and status = 1
select * from entity where parent_id = #{id} and status = 1
select * from entity where status = 1 order by parent_id, id
select id from entity where name = #{name}
